ca.sevenless.pixelcrops.display

Class ThreadedCanvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Canvas
        • ca.sevenless.pixelcrops.display.ThreadedCanvas
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class ThreadedCanvas
extends java.awt.Canvas
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Handles the program specific painting of the canvas for the GameProject, as well as being the location for threaded run code to repaint the screen.
    Author:
    Sevenless
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
